title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.5 - Payment for purchases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.5 - Payment for purchases

State Regulations

Emergency purchase, rental and requisition in the name of
the State under this Part shall be paid for by the State as hereinafter
prescribed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
